attributes.action: in the light of the budget fiasco propose a debate of no confidence
attributes.additional_details:
Ian Duncan Smiths resignation over the 2016 budget cuts to Pip
on grounds you couldnt keep salami slicing work age welfare.
investigation by the United Nations over Britains treatment of the disabled .100 people a week dying after having a fit for work assessment and benefit cuts. We propose a vote of no confidence in the government
attributes.background: Policy has increased poverty and homelessness and resulted in deaths of many disabled people . This government  has no policy able to help those less fortuneate to gain employment. In the light of welfare deaths the government should resign as they are all culpable

rejection.details:
